title: The Stolen Herd
description: Mandamus is only a foal when his herd is captured by the terrible Rakhana Army . Rescued and raised in secrecy, he knows nothing of his heritage until a dreadful incident in the woods brings him to the attention of the Forest council â€“ and everyone else. Sent away for his own protection, he is determined to seek help on behalf of the many animals who have gone missing from the forest, including his own family. With the help of a troubled man and a stout-hearted bat, can Mandamus save his fellow creatures before it's too late?
author: K. Madill
